name: UFO Attack (HydroGene)
description:
Description will come soon, because I'm still in development, sorry!! 

But I hope you still enjoy the beginning of this little arcade game! :)

Keyboard Controls : 
  • LEFT / RIGHT Arrow Keys to move
  • X to Shoot
  • R to Reload
XBox360 Controls : 
  • Joystick or Directional Pad to move
  • A to Shoot
  • B to Reload
